text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in TNM Primary Tumor Category Value Set
  • Include all codes defined in https://www.uicc.org/resources/tnm

name: TNMPrimaryTumorCategoryMaxVS
title: TNM Primary Tumor Maximum Value Set
publisher: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

contact.name: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

description: Values for TNM primary tumor category must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMPrimaryTumorCategoryVS.
